price: Rabbiin kee waan qomoowwan isaanii dhoksituufi waan isaan mul’isanis ni beeka.
arabic: وَرَبُّكَ يَعۡلَمُ مَا تُكِنُّ صُدُورُهُمۡ وَمَا يُعۡلِنُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: warabbuka yaʿlamu mā tukinnu ṣudūruhum wamā yuʿ'linūna
